pkgmetadata.longdescription: Building PRS Models Based on Summary Statistics of GWAs // Shrinkage estimator for polygenic risk prediction (PRS) models based on summary statistics of genome-wide association (GWA) studies. Based upon the methods and original 'PANPRS' package as found in: Chen, Chatterjee, Landi, and Shi (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1764849.
